title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 309: Featuring Pierre McGuire
description:
On Episode 309 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets the guys are joined by Pierre McGuire. Pierre joined (1:06:35) to discuss his coaching career, his TV career and some hilarious stories along the way. The guys also talk about their month off and get caught up on each others lives. After the guys are done catching up they talk some hockey including the return to play plan, they also broke the Logan Paul vs Evander Kane and then finally they wrap up with some reverse retro talk.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
